languages.text: {n}Комендант спешит последовать примеру палача.{/n} "Воистину, наш позор не смыть до скончания времен! Молим вас о прощении, Звездное Сиятельство, дабы могли до конца жизни своей замаливать грехи деяниями праведными!"

{n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"
languages.original_text: {n}Комендант спешит последовать примеру палача.{/n} "Воистину, наш позор не смыть до скончания времен! Молим вас о прощении, Звездное Сиятельство, дабы могли до конца жизни своей замаливать грехи деяниями праведными!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for {mf|His Celestial Lordship|Her Celestial Ladyship}'s forgiveness so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

{n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for {mf|His Celestial Lordship|Her Celestial Ladyship}'s forgiveness so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

{n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for {mf|His Celestial Lordship|Her Celestial Ladyship}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

{n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for {mf|His Celestial Lordship|Her Celestial Ladyship}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

{n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

{n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

languages.text: {n}指挥官见状，也立刻跪了下来。{/n}“确实如此，我们的耻辱恐怕永远都无法洗刷！我们乞求您的宽恕，来自上界的大人。请您允许我们穷尽一生，进行正义的忏悔！”
languages.original_text: {n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}指挥官见状，也立刻跪了下来。{/n}“确实如此，我们的耻辱恐怕永远都无法洗刷！我们乞求您的宽恕，来自上界的大人。请您允许我们穷尽一生，进行正义的忏悔！”

languages.text: {n}El comandante también se arrodilla sin perder un segundo.{/n} «¡En verdad nuestra deshonra no quedará lavada hasta el fin de los tiempos! ¡Rogamos el perdón de {mf|nuestro Señor|nuestra Señora} Celestial para que podamos hacer acto de contrición durante el resto de nuestras vidas!».
languages.original_text: {n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El comandante también se arrodilla sin perder un segundo.{/n} «¡En verdad nuestra deshonra no quedará lavada hasta el fin de los tiempos! ¡Rogamos el perdón de {mf|nuestro Señor|nuestra Señora} Celestial para que podamos hacer acto de contrición durante el resto de nuestras vidas!».

languages.text: {n}Komutan da hızla diz çöküyor.{/n} "Gerçekten de utancımız, zamanın sonuna kadar geçmeyecek! Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} affı için yalvarıyoruz ki ömür boyu sürecek adil cezamızla hizmet edebilelim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Komutan da hızla diz çöküyor.{/n} "Gerçekten de utancımız, zamanın sonuna kadar geçmeyecek! Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} affı için yalvarıyoruz ki ömür boyu sürecek adil cezamızla hizmet edebilelim!"

languages.text: {n}すると、すぐに司令官がひざまずく。{/n}「本当です。私たちの恥は死ぬまで漱がれることはないでしょう！天の{mf|君|姫}のお許しを乞います。さすれば、一生をかけて罪を償います！」
languages.original_text: {n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}すると、すぐに司令官がひざまずく。{/n}「本当です。私たちの恥は死ぬまで漱がれることはないでしょう！天の{mf|君|姫}のお許しを乞います。さすれば、一生をかけて罪を償います！」

languages.text: {n}Le commandant s'agenouille rapidement à son tour.{/n} « Après un tel manquement, notre honte marquera l'histoire jusqu'à la fin des temps ! Nous implorons humblement Votre Céleste Seigneurie de bien vouloir nous épargner pour que nous puissions passer le reste de nos jours en juste pénitence ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commandant s'agenouille rapidement à son tour.{/n} « Après un tel manquement, notre honte marquera l'histoire jusqu'à la fin des temps ! Nous implorons humblement Votre Céleste Seigneurie de bien vouloir nous épargner pour que nous puissions passer le reste de nos jours en juste pénitence ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Kommandant sinkt ebenfalls auf die Knie.{/n} "Wahrlich, unsere Schande kann bis zum Ende aller Zeiten nicht fortgewaschen werden! Wir flehen {mf|unseren himmlischen Herren|unsere himmlische Herrin} um Vergebung an, auf dass wir lebenslang rechtschaffen Buße tun können!"
languages.original_text: {n}The commander quickly kneels in turn.{/n} "Truly, our shame will not be washed away until the end of time! We beg for our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s forgiveness, so that we might serve our lifelong righteous penance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommandant sinkt ebenfalls auf die Knie.{/n} "Wahrlich, unsere Schande kann bis zum Ende aller Zeiten nicht fortgewaschen werden! Wir flehen {mf|unseren himmlischen Herren|unsere himmlische Herrin} um Vergebung an, auf dass wir lebenslang rechtschaffen Buße tun können!"
